text: How do I parse lines from a log file?
I need to extract the values of following output:

code: Oct  6 17:29:52 FW kernel: [ 5470.058450] ipTables: IN= OUT=eth0 SRC=192.168.1.116 DST=192.168.1.110 LEN=516 TOS=0x10 PREC=0x00 TTL=64 ID=4949 DF PROTO=TCP SPT=22 DPT=46216 WINDOW=446 RES=0x00 ACK PSH URGP=0

text: I'd need for example the value of PROTO stored in a value.
tried shellscripting, my problem is that it works only if the log entry is in the same order everytime.

code:
while read line
do
        in_if=`echo $line | cut -d ' ' -f 10 | cut -d '=' -f 2`;
        out_if=`echo $line | cut -d ' ' -f 11 | cut -d '=' -f 2`;
        src_ip=`echo $line | cut -d ' ' -f 12 | cut -d '=' -f 2`;
        dst_ip=`echo $line | cut -d ' ' -f 13 | cut -d '=' -f 2`;
        pro=`echo $line | cut -d ' ' -f 20 | cut -d '=' -f 2`;
        echo "$in_if,$out_if,$src_ip,$dst_ip,$pro" >> output.csv;
done < $tmp_file
